channel.title: Sun on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Sun on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Sun
item.description: I ask for guidance And correction Direction And fortitude And understanding Clear presence And mind And health Clear message Gentleness Wisdom And rectitude Protection And mercy Supplies And light Consistency And majesty Chords And Lyric Words And calling Home And peace

item.title: Sun
item.description: I want to see your thick Unapology. I want to see your best In me. Supple. Lying. In this dark bliss. The caverness. Of unyielding. Wastedness. Your eyes. In candlelight. Remind me. Of stricken gold light. And that bracelet. So unforetold. The glimmering diamond. Can I be so bold? I wish your Cadaver. Could be examined. Placed in abandon. To dance with. And holding tight. Abounding might. When you see me.
